## Variational Inference

* [Variational Inference: A Review for Statisticians](https://arxiv.org/abs/1601.00670)
* [Automatic Variational Inference in Stan](https://arxiv.org/abs/1506.03431) describes the general approach used for variational inference here (*automatic* or *stochastic* inference using more Monte Carlo and less math)
* A [different variational approach](http://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/10618600.2016.1164708) (no Monte Carlo sampling but lots of math) for specific JSDM-like problems.
